name: CLOUD WALKER (Pouya Amiri)
description:
Beta build of a single screen 2d platformer. 

Walk on the clouds, dodge the lightning, bounce on the thunderclouds and reach the portal to advance to the next level.

Use arrow keys to move right/left and up arrow key or space  to jump. 

Press "L" to go back to the Level Selection menu. 

When in Level Select, press Esc to return to the main menu.
